definitions.text: the process of giving careful thought to something
information that should be kept in mind when making a decision
examples: another consideration is the time it would take

definitions.text: a discussion of a topic (as in a meeting)
examples: consideration of the traffic problem took more than an hour

definitions.text: kind and considerate regard for others
examples: he showed no consideration for her feelings

definitions.text: a fee charged in advance to retain the services of someone
